H0.text: Pantagruel was the son of which giant. Atlas

H1.text: Pantagruel was the son of which giant. Polyphemus

H2.text: Pantagruel was the son of which giant. Hercules

H3.text: Pantagruel was the son of which giant. Gargantua

A4.text: the full modern English title... son of the Great Giant Gargantua

A5.text: the adventures of two giants, Gargantua... and his son Pantagruel
